channel.title: Python on Hugo Grimoire

item.title: local-llm
item.description: TheraFit is a personal project and Large Language Model approach to matching clients to therapists. Environment Setup Clone the Git repository. 1git clone https://github.com/Trimad/TheraFit Install Miniconda. Create the environment 1conda create --name local-llm python=3.11.4 --channel conda-forge 1conda activate local-llm Install pip requirements 1pip3 install -r requirements.txt Install the Windows version of bitsandbytes 1python -m pip install bitsandbytes --prefer-binary --extra-index-url=https://jllllll.github.io/bitsandbytes-windows-webui Force reinstall torch until it works 1pip3 install torch torchvision torchaudio --index-url https://download.
